briefTitle: Clinical Study of 68Ga Labeled HER2 Affibody Analogues
officialTitle: Clinical Study of 68Ga Labeled HER2 Affibody Analogues in Healthy Volunteers and Patients With Breast or Gastric Tumors
conditions: HER2-positive Breast Cancer and Gastric Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* patients with breast or gastric cancers: diagnosed by MR and ready for surgery

Exclusion Criteria:

* refuse or cannot endure surgery pregnant women
